thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com
thread.title: catherine stanley

author: catherine stanley
title: catherine stanley
text:
Joining trusted housesitters was the best decision we ever made.
We travel frequently and always put our dogs in kennels.We heard of
trusted housesitters by accident through the media.Initally we thought it
was too good to be true-but we were mistaken.This has revolutionised our
lives.We use the site both as housesitters and homeowners looking for
sitters.I recomend this site to others on a daily basis.
